Content: To counter piracy, it should be possible to arm merchant
ships/transports. This would the contribute alongside the presence of
naval forces and local police to the piracy in the stystem. The factor
would be armament/transported-cargo. The contribution by the merchant
ships should be considerable lower, than that of the navy or police, to
encourage the usage of dedicated police forces. (The idea is more to
provided a minimal protection level for all trade.)
